description:
Can you defeat your sister who has fused with the evil god? With Mu’s question, Shoko agonizes over the fate she bears. That’s when Orion Rigel, the Ghost of an ex-Silver Saint, stands before Shoko. From Rigel’s sad eyes that once shared a past with Kyoko during Saint years, Shoko senses his true feelings and... 
Mii vs. Emony, Aiolia vs. Saga, the individual battles within the Temple of Eris begins…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Spiral of Conflict! The Golden Apple and Orion`s Devotion
Arasoi no Uzu! Ougon no Ringo to Orion no Kenshin
Bir Anlaşmazlığın Sarmalı‚ Altın Elma İle Avcı’nın Fedakârlığı
Le maelström du conflit ! La pomme d`or et la dévotion d`Orion
ودامة وصراع، تفاني التفاحة الذهبية والإله أوريون
争いの渦! 黄金の林檎とオリオンの献身
